Description: Returns all nodes that match the provided :node_label
Description of a specific node in the databae, returns information about node including label, ID, latitutude, longitude
Returns a collection of nodes that need to be functional for the current :node_label to operate
Returns a collection of nodes that need to be functional for the current :node_label to operate, but results are filtered to show only results matching the :filter_label
Returns a collection of nodes that rely on the current :node_label in order to operate
